tweet.text: June 1: Here are some great historic photos of President Reagan and General Secretary Gorbachev signing the INF Treaty ratification at the Grand Kremlin palace during the Moscow Summit: 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/uJ2gNXM8aH
